title: PlotSquared 插件怎么给玩家上船的权限啊
txt_content:

replies.author: fyxrim
replies.txt_content:
pex权限插件
pex group 玩家组 add plots.admin.interact.other
pex group 玩家组 add plots.admin.vehicle.break.other

gm权限插件
mangaddp 玩家组 plots.admin.interact.other
mangaddp 玩家组 plots.admin.vehicle.break.other
